The company began when crates of tea was salvaged from the historic Boston Tea Party. Two centuries later, they have come up with the best tea available online. Boston Tea has created a very successful blend by fusing the old traditional English tea with the new. Boston Tea leaves are picked at the peak of perfection and processed by artisans using old, traditional techniques that ensure the highest quality and healthiest cup of tea.
